cards.markdown:
[![](https://i0.wp.com/static.flickr.com/29/40247197_e6481921fa.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/40247197/ "photo sharing") [The Wharf](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/40247197/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
The other morning, I was forced to catch the DLR to work, rather than my accustomed train. I changed from the Jubilee Line at Heron Quays, and was immediately struck by how much more aesthetically pleasing Canary Wharf has become since the towers proliferated. Just for a moment, I felt I was looking up at a film backdrop, not a real view at all. And that pleased me.
